item.title: I get an error
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:1, topic:278897”]if(NPCID == 239) { if(playerRights == 1) { if(playerRights == 2) { if(playerRights == 3) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; } else sM("You have to be a staff member to access this shop");

See, well on my server- I going to have 3rd age hard to obtain. I’m making it so that you can only get it from a clue. When I got that idea, I was thinking to myself “Wow… I should make a shop for my staff so it’s easier to get for them.” So I made the code and I get 100 errors, if you need the above or below code, please post for it, that is you’re willing to help and NOT leech.[/quote]

use this:

if(playerRights == > 1) {

item.title: I get an error

item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

if(NPCID == 239) { if(playerRights == 1) { if(playerRights == 2) { if(playerRights == 3) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; } else sM("You have to be a staff member to access this shop"); }

See, well on my server- I going to have 3rd age hard to obtain. I’m making it so that you can only get it from a clue. When I got that idea, I was thinking to myself “Wow… I should make a shop for my staff so it’s easier to get for them.” So I made the code and I get 100 errors, if you need the above or below code, please post for it, that is you’re willing to help and NOT leech.
